revision.text:
{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Wett Upa |image = |caption = Wett Upa |category = Minor Enemy |type = [[Upa]] |level = 58-59 |area = [[Erythia Sea]] |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = }} '''Wett Upas''' are Minor Enemies in {{XC3}}. They are members of the [[Upa]] family, and can be found at level 58-59 in the [[Pentelas Region]], or at [[Cape Arcaphor]] in [[Erythia Sea]]. {{clr}} == Challenge Battle Mode == {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |tab1 = Minor Enemy |name = Wett Upa |image = |caption = Wett Upa |type = [[Upa]] |movement = Ground |area = [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]] |category = [[Challenge Battle Enemy (XC3)|Challenge Battle Enemy]] |level = 38-142 |detection = |spawntime = During ''[[Gauntlet: Beginner]]''
During ''[[Gauntlet: Pro]]'' |respawn = No |hp = |strength = |healing = |dexterity = |agility = |physdef = -10% |ethdef = 15% |critrate = 8% |guardrate = 0% |tab2 = Inter. Stage 50 |name2 = Wett Upa |image2 = |caption2 = Wett Upa |type2 = [[Upa]] |movement2 = Ground |area2 = [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]] |category2 = [[Challenge Battle Enemy (XC3)|Challenge Battle]] [[Boss (XC3)|Boss]] |level2 = 70 |detection2 = |spawntime2 = During ''[[Gauntlet: Intermediate]]'' |respawn2 = No |hp2 = 603,240 |strength2 = 442 |healing2 = 2,173 |dexterity2 = 258 |agility2 = 312 |physdef2 = -10% |ethdef2 = 15% |critrate2 = 8% |guardrate2 = 0% }} '''Wett Upas''' are [[Challenge Battle Enemy (XC3)|Challenge Battle Enemies]] that can spawn as regular enemies in the [[Archsage's Gauntlet]]. They can appear in the following stages, at the following levels (subject to level adjustment events): *Stages 27-29 of ''[[Gauntlet: Beginner]]'', at level 38 *Stages 31-33 of ''[[Gauntlet: Pro]]'', at level 81 *Stages 61-63 of ''Gauntlet: Pro'', at level 96 *Stages 91-93 of ''Gauntlet: Pro'', at level 111 *Stages 111-113 of ''Gauntlet: Pro'', at level 122 *Stages 131-133 of ''Gauntlet: Pro'', at level 142 Additionally, two Wett Upas appear as [[Boss (XC3)|Bosses]] alongside a [[Yolmun Drague]], all fought at level 70 on Stage 50 of ''[[Gauntlet: Intermediate]]''. === Minor Enemy Stats === Lv 38=

Level 38

{{XC3 Enemy Stats |hp = 12,801 |atk = 343 |heal = 307 |dex = 136 |agil = 171 }} |-| Lv 81=

Level 81

{{XC3 Enemy Stats |hp = 120,907 |atk = 1,168 |heal = 1,704 |dex = 303 |agil = 364 }} |-| Lv 96=

Level 96

{{XC3 Enemy Stats |hp = 446,292 |atk = 2,902 |heal = 5,613 |dex = 369 |agil = 437 }} |-| Lv 111=

Level 111

{{XC3 Enemy Stats |hp = 1,112,312 |atk = 5,272 |heal = 13,174 |dex = 423 |agil = 502 }} |-| Lv 122=

Level 122

{{XC3 Enemy Stats |hp = 1,717,791 |atk = 7,091 |heal = 19,904 |dex = 467 |agil = 555 }} |-| Lv 142=

Level 142

{{XC3 Enemy Stats |hp = 2,716,187 |atk = 9,748 |heal = 30,448 |dex = 517 |agil = 614 }} === Skills === All Wett Upas in the Archsage's Gauntlet have the following skill: * Deals 10% less damage but takes 30% less damage. Additionally, the boss Wett Upas in ''Gauntlet: Intermediate'' also have the following skill: * Boosts Art recharge speed by 50%. === Resistances === {{XC3 Resistances|physdebuff = 35%|etherdebuff = 35%}} {{clr}} === Arts === {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:100%;" !Name !Attribute !Targets !Hits !Power !Reactions/Statuses |- |'''''Auto-Attack''''' |Physical |One Target |1 |100% | |- |'''Hypno-Light''' |Debuff |AOE on Target | - | - |[[Sleep (XC3)|Sleep]] |} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Minor Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battle Bosses]] [[Category:Pentelas Region Enemies]] [[Category:Cadensia Region Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Upas]] [[Category:XC3 Level 56-60 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 66-70 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 100+ Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing an infobox image]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]]

{{Infobox quest |name = Where The Heart Is |image = Where_The_Heart_Is.jpg |description = "Rumor has it that a raid on Colony 9 is planned. If true, it can't be ignored. Go there, and help your comrades." |giver = |location = [[Eagus Wilderness]] ([[Colony 4]]) |time = |prereqs = Departed [[Colony 4]] (Starting Chapter 3)
''Colony 9 Lately'' discussed |reclevel = Lv. 22 |rewards = 400 [[Colony 9 (XC3)|Colony 9]] [[Affinity (XC3)|Affinity]]
1440 [[Experience Points (XC3)|EXP]]
1650 [[Gold|G]]
10 [[Soul Tree|SP]]
[[Zeon]] as a [[Hero]] }} '''Where The Heart Is''' is a [[Hero Quest]] in {{XC3}}, dedicated to [[Zeon]]. == Objectives == # ''Head for the specified location(s).'' #* [[Colony 9 (XC3)|Colony 9]] # ''Defeat the specified foe(s).'' #* Colony 9 Expedition (4) # ''Head for the specified location(s).'' #* [[Colony 9 Command]] # ''Head for the specified location(s).'' #* [[Everblight Plain]] # ''Defeat the specified foe(s).'' #* Agnus Strike Force (15) # ''Head for the specified location(s).'' #* [[Colony 9 Front Gate]] # ''Defeat the specified foe(s).'' #* [[B#Battle|Moebius B]] == Results == ''"Through helping him escape the bondage of Moebius, Noah formed a deep bond with Zeon. He will make for a very capable ally."'' {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Hero Quests]] [[Category:Zeon]] [[Category:Fornis Region Quests]]

|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Whirlwind Necklace |image = XC3 Accessory Choker.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt by 10% when HP is at 30% or lower. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 1920 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Whirlwind Necklace |image = XC3 Accessory Choker.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt by 15% when HP is at 30% or lower. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 1920 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Whirlwind Necklace |image = XC3 Accessory Choker.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt by 20% when HP is at 30% or lower. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 1920 [[Gold|G]] }}
